001package com.technototes.library.logger;
002
003import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.FIELD;
004import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.LOCAL_VARIABLE;
005import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.METHOD;
006
007import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
008import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
009import java.lang.annotation.Target;
010
011/** Annotations for configuring Logs
012 * @author Alex Stedman
013 */
014@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
015public @interface LogConfig {
016    /** Annotation for determining when logged item will be sent to Telemetry
017     *
018     */
019    @Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
020    @Target(value = { FIELD, LOCAL_VARIABLE, METHOD })
021    @interface Run {
022        /** Run the log during the teleop Period
023         *
024         * @return The above condition
025         */
026        boolean duringRun() default true;
027
028        /** Run the log during the init Period
029         *
030         * @return The above condition
031         */
032        boolean duringInit() default false;
033    }
034
035    /** Annotation for Whitelisting Opmodes to log this item
036     *
037     */
038    @Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
039    @Target(value = { FIELD, LOCAL_VARIABLE, METHOD })
040    @interface Whitelist {
041        /** The whitelisted opmodes
042         *
043         * @return Opmode Classes
044         */
045        Class<?>[] value();
046    }
047
048    /** Annotation for Blacklisting Opmodes to log this item
049     *
050     */
051    @Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
052    @Target(value = { FIELD, LOCAL_VARIABLE, METHOD })
053    @interface Blacklist {
054        /** The blacklisted opmodes
055         *
056         * @return Opmode Classes
057         */
058        Class<?>[] value();
059    }
060
061    /** Annotation to completely disable the entry
062     *
063     */
064    @Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
065    @Target(value = { FIELD, LOCAL_VARIABLE, METHOD })
066    @interface Disabled {
067    }
068}
